column1: Smoque BBQ////This place is so good
column2: I've had the brisket sandwich before but wanted something healthier when I went there today. Instead
column3: I got the small salad (which was huge) with chicken in it. It was really good
column7: and cucumber. I got BBQ sauce for the chicken and used a teeny bit of the ranch
column8: and it was perfect! I had to hold myself back from ordering cornbread
column9: it's probably awesome though. I've had the mac n' cheese before
column10: and it's really good as well. They were super quick and everyone was smiling and friendly.
